original_text:
Your choicest valleys were full of chariots,
    and the horsemen took their stand at the gates.
korean_text: 병거는 네 아름다운 골짜기에 가득하였고 마병은 성문에 정렬되었도다

sentences.original_text: Your choicest valleys were full of chariots
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 가장 좋은 골짜기들은 전차로 가득 찼습니다.

sentences.original_text: and the horsemen took their stand at the gates.
